version_description:
Fixed a few crashes
Added the ability to view all unlocked recipes in the options menu

Long press an item to view its recipe.
Added an option to restart the game and start over.
Fixed a few minor bugs.

iCloud Support, build and share factories on multiple devices.
Multiple worlds, create and play on new procedurally generated worlds.
Increased the amount of resources generated in new worlds.
Reduced the amount of water generated in worlds.
Music and sound will respect the silent mode toggle on devices.
Fixed a bug with underground belts mixing items.
Fixed a rare crash when placing buildings.

- Items will do better at staying on conveyor belts, especially when underground.
- Minor performance improvement for large factories.

- Items on underground belts will now stay underground when reloading the game.
- Performance improvements for large factories.
